predicate.note: Frames file for 'lag' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'outpace' which I fortunately just framed.

example.name: lag behind
example.text: Yesterday, bank stocks lagged behind the overall OTC market.

example.name: NP object
example.text: But the move lagged a stronger rise in New York Stock Exchange issues.
example.arg: a stronger rise in New York Stock Exchange issues

example.name: with EXT
example.text: Advancers on the Big Board lagged decliners 662 to 829.

example.name: with MNR
example.text: Amoco Corp. said third-quarter net income plunged 39% to $336 million as gasoline refining and marketing profits lagged substantially behind last year's record level.
